definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to the grammatical case prototypically used to indicate the sole argument of an intransitive verb , and the more patientive argument of a transitive verb .
Of, exhibiting, or pertaining to absolution ; absolutory , absolving .

main_definition: ( grammar ) Of or pertaining to the grammatical case prototypically used to indicate the sole argument of an intransitive verb , and the more patientive argument of a transitive verb .
secondary_definitions: ( rare ) Of, exhibiting, or pertaining to absolution ; absolutory , absolving .
